mapper.select: select evno, evtitle, bno, evtype, null as save_file_name from event limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into event(bno, etpno, evtitle, evtype, evsdate, evedate, evcontent, evinfo) values(#{bno},#{etpno}, #{title}, #{type}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{content}, #{info})
mapper.select: select e.evtitle, e.evtype, e.evsdate, e.evedate, e.evcontent, e.evinfo, b.bname, et.etptitle, ef.save_file_name from event e join branch b on e.bno=b.bno left outer join event_template et on e.etpno=et.etpno left outer join event_file ef on e.evno=ef.evno where e.evno=#{eventNo}
